name: JNI Library
summary: Learn about .JNILIB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The Mac Developer Library documentation states that JNI libraries written for Mac OS X must use the ".jnilib" extension.

description: Developer library used by JNI (Java Native Interface), a framework that allows Java to integrate with other programming languages; contains functions or methods that provide the invocation interface between the programming languages.
